Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.cdcvm

Interface DeviceCVMVerifyListener

  • public interface DeviceCVMVerifyListener
    This interface is "called" by the SDK in order to inform the MPA for the biometric fingerprint/Device keyguard authentication status.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onVerifyError​(SDKError<java.lang.Integer> error)
      This API is called when there is an error occurred during the verification process.
      void onVerifyFailed()
      This API is called when verification fails.
      void onVerifyHelp​(int pHelpCode, java.lang.CharSequence pHelpString)
      This API is called whenever a recoverable error occurred during the verification process.
      void onVerifySuccess()
      This API is called if the fingerprint verification or device keyguard is successful.

    • Method Detail

      • onVerifySuccess

        void onVerifySuccess()
        This API is called if the fingerprint verification or device keyguard is successful. The MPA is now able to proceed to the next flow.
        See Also:
        BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback#onAuthenticationSucceeded(BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationResult)

      • onVerifyError

        void onVerifyError​(SDKError<java.lang.Integer> error)
        This API is called when there is an error occurred during the verification process. The error is normally unrecoverable. An error code and message will be provided for proper handling. The MPA is expected to trigger the Keyguard fallback.
        Parameters:
        error - the error .
        See Also:
        BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback#onAuthenticationError(int, CharSequence), BiometricPrompt Error Codes

      • onVerifyFailed

        void onVerifyFailed()
        This API is called when verification fails. The end-user is expected to try again or MPA to trigger the Keyguard fallback if it is Bio fingerprint method.
        See Also:
        BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback#onAuthenticationFailed()

      • onVerifyHelp

        void onVerifyHelp​(int pHelpCode,
                  java.lang.CharSequence pHelpString)
        This API is called whenever a recoverable error occurred during the verification process. The end-user is expected to try again or MPA to trigger the Keyguard fallback if it is Bio fingerprint method.
        Parameters:
        pHelpCode - the help code.
        pHelpString - the help string.
        See Also:
        BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback#onAuthenticationHelp(int, CharSequence), BiometricPrompt Help Codes
